raw: U.S. crude dips below $20 as lockdowns wipe out demand .
replaced: U.S. crude dips below $20 as lockdowns wipe out demand .

raw: LONDON ( Reuters ) - Oil prices fell sharply on Monday , with U.S. crude briefly dropping below $ 20 and Brent hitting its lowest level in 18 years , on heightened fears that the global coronavirus shutdown could last months and demand for fuel could decline further .
replaced: LONDON ( Reuters ) - Oil prices fell sharply on Monday , with U.S. crude briefly dropping below $ 20 and Brent hitting Brent lowest level in 18 years , on heightened fears that the global coronavirus shutdown could last months and demand for fuel could decline further .

raw: U.S. West Texas Intermediate ( WTI ) crude fell $ 1.11 , or 5.2 % , to $ 20.40 .
Earlier in the session , WTI fell as low as $ 19.92 .

raw: The price of oil is now so low that it is becoming unprofitable for many oil firms to remain active , analysts said , and higher cost producers will have no choice but to shut production , especially since storage capacities are almost full .
replaced: The price of oil is now so low that it is becoming unprofitable for many oil firms to remain active , analysts said , and higher cost producers will have no choice but to shut production , especially since storage capacities are almost full .

raw: “ Global oil demand is evaporating on the back of COVID-19 - related travel restrictions and social distancing measures , ” said UBS oil analyst Giovanni Staunovo .
replaced: “ Global oil demand is evaporating on the back of COVID-19 - related travel restrictions and social distancing measures , ” said UBS oil analyst Giovanni Staunovo .

raw: “ In the near term , oil prices may need to trade lower into the cash cost curve to trigger production shut - ins to start to prevent tank tops to be reached , ” he added .
replaced: “ In the near term , oil prices may need to trade lower into the cash cost curve to trigger production shut - ins to start to prevent tank tops to be reached , ” UBS oil analyst Giovanni Staunovo added .

raw: Rystad Energy ’s head of oil markets , Bjornar Tonhaugen , said : “ The oil market supply chains are broken due to the unbelievably large losses in oil demand , forcing all available alternatives of supply chain adjustments to take place during April and May , ” including cutting refinery runs and increasing onshore or offshore storage .
replaced: Rystad Energy ’s head of oil markets , Bjornar Tonhaugen , said : “ The oil market supply chains are broken due to the unbelievably large losses in oil demand , forcing all available alternatives of supply chain adjustments to take place during April and May , ” including cutting refinery runs and increasing onshore or offshore storage .

raw: Supertanker freight rates are rising for a second time this month as traders rush to secure ships for storage .
replaced: Supertanker freight rates are rising for a second time this month as traders rush to secure ships for storage .

raw: Goldman Sachs analysts said demand from commuters and airlines , which account for about 16 million barrels per day of global consumption , may never return to previous levels .

raw: The contango spread between May and November Brent crude futures reached its widest ever at $ 13.45 a barrel , while the six - month spread for U.S. crude broadened to minus $ 12.85 a barrel , the widest discount since February 2009 .
